Articles.Content:
The team appears to be stranded.   The "F" key to grab onto the lander/command module is not grabbing.  And "B" to board does nothing either. 

 

I tried to reload but I am not sure what else to try here.  Looks like the Minmus mission was a successful failure.

That happened to me too!

And it's not only in Minmun... that happen everywhere. Once you are out, that kerbal is gone!

Same for the Mun, and then after walking away from the ship to explore since he was stranded, the ship mysteriously disintegrated in the distance. That kerbol is now stuck looking at the destruction and knowing he has no way home.
